title: Chat History Isolation Between Users
description: Verify that User1's chat history, sessions, and messages are completely isolated from User2's chat history. Each user should only see their own messages, sessions, and have their own credits and pipelines.

steps.description: Login as User1
Wait for chat interface to load
Send a unique message as User1: 'User1 Private Message - {timestamp}'
Verify message appears in User1's chat history
Sign out from User1
Login as User2
Verify User2's chat history does NOT contain User1's message
Send a unique message as User2: 'User2 Private Message - {timestamp}'
Verify User2 only sees their own message
Sign out from User2
Login back as User1
Verify User1 only sees their own message (not User2's)
Verify User1's session list only contains their own sessions

title: User2 Creates and Sends Chat Message
description: Verify User2 can create a chat session and send messages

steps.description: Login as User2 (user2@gmail.com / test12345) in separate browser context
Wait for chat interface to load
Type a test message: 'Hello from User2'
Send the message
Verify message appears in the chat history
Verify message is marked as from User2
Verify AI response is received (if applicable)
